feature_defs.trigger: when you use Reckless Attack while your Rage is active
effects: You deal extra damage to the first target you hit on your turn with a Strength-based attack.
Extra damage equals a number of d6s equal to your Rage Damage bonus; add the dice together.
The extra damage is the same type as the weapon or unarmed strike used.
You are immune to the Charmed and Frightened conditions.
limits: If you are Charmed or Frightened when you enter your Rage, the condition ends on you.

feature_defs.trigger: when you take damage from a creature within 5 feet of you
effects: You make one melee attack against that creature with a weapon or an unarmed strike.
Creatures of your choice in a 30-foot emanation make a Wisdom saving throw.
On a failed save, a creature is Frightened for 1 minute and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.
limits: Once you use this feature, you can't use it again until you finish a long rest unless you expend a use of your Rage (no action required) to restore its use.
notes: saving throw DC is 8 + Strength modifier + proficiency bonus
